title: wine_Failla_2010_Estate_Vineyard_Chardonnay_(Sonoma_Coast)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 118059.
country: US.
description: Shows classic, full-throttle notes of tropical and citrus fruits, pears and sweet green apples, combined with strong minerality and complex layers of buttered toast, honey and creamy lees. The description alone hardly does justice to the wine's beauty. The acidity is perfect, the oak deftly applied, the finish long and completely satisfying. Winemaker Ehren Jordan suggests pairing it with simple fare like roast chicken and salted fingerling potatoes..
designation: Estate Vineyard.
points: 99.
price: 44.0.
